job.title: Machine Learning Researcher / Simulation Software Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Information Services,Capital Markets
job.description: The high frequency trading team is seeking a Research Engineer to join them in Austin. The role will involve implementing features, models, and strategies in C++ and managing the in-house compute and data cluster, job scheduler, and Python based pipeline to provide robust, efficient 24/7 backtest/simulation/research environment. Requirements : Strong engineering instincts and a deep understanding of computer science fundamentals. Experience in statistical modelling, mathematics. An ability to generate research ideas and implement and execute solutions to represent them. Innovative, big-picture thinking grounded in real-world pragmatism. A desire to continuously improve in a rapidly evolving environment. A readiness to set technical direction, promote engineering principles, and do the right thing. Strong experience with C++, Python & Linux. Experience with GPUs, FPGAs is interesting but not essential. Candidates from national labs, high frequency trading firms and top tier tech firms are of particular interest. Suitable for candidates with between 4-10 years of industry experiance. No financial experience is required. However an interest in financial markets and machine learning in the context of automated high frequency trading is a pre-request.
